title: Banana Crumb Muffins
ingredients: ['Muffins', '200g (7oz) plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '3 bananas, mashed', '150g (5oz) caster sugar', '1 egg, lightly beaten', '75g (3oz) butter, melted', 'Crumb Topping', '75g (3oz) brown sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '1/8 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon butter']
